short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Makes text of ReqTest header a link to the current page

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: There is no place to copy ReqTest item with its hyperlink. So, I created this extension to update the header with a hyperlink for easy sharing of ID along with hyperlink
